links.*: The Houses of Healing (The War of the Ring)

wikitext.*:
'''''-ro''''' or '''''-r''''' is a [[Quenya]] affix, used to create an [[Wikipedia:Agentive ending|agentive ending]] (to create a noun from a verb; compare English ''speaker''/''speak'').<ref>{{WJ|A}}, p. 371</ref><ref name=HF>[[Helge Fauskanger]], "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/affix~1.htm Quenya Affixes]" at [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion] (accessed 15 December 2011)</ref>
==Examples==

*''[[ista-]]'' ("know") / ''[[Istari|ista'''r''']]'' ("wizard", "knower")<ref name=HF/>
*''envinyata-'' ("renew"; unattested)<ref name=HF/> / ''[[Envinyatar|Envinyata'''r''']]'' ("Renewer")<ref>{{WR|3|XI}}, p. 395 (note 13)</ref>
